name: BMW 330xd Touring Edition 2001 Manual 5 doors specs
description:
BMW 330xd Touring Edition is a 2001 Station wagon model with 6 speed manual transmission.
    
With a power of 150 KW you can reach  0-100km h in just 7,9 seconds and a maximum speed of 230 km/h with an urban consumption of 10,3 l/100km.
The engine has a capacity of 2993 cc with 6, in line cylinders and 4 valves per cylinders.

Also this model has a weight of  with coil springs front suspension and a coil springs rear suspension.
